nobleroar.name: 战吼
nobleroar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
nobleroar.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

brutalswing.name: 狂舞挥打
brutalswing.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

calmmind.name: 冥想
calmmind.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
calmmind.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 1.

doomdesire.name: 破灭之愿
doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
doomdesire.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

dragontail.name: 龙尾
dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Ability Suction Cups, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

freezeshock.name: 冰冻伏特
freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

razorshell.name: 贝壳刃
razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
razorshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

wideguard.name: 广域防守
wideguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
wideguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from multi-target hits this turn.

clangingscales.name: 鳞片噪音
clangingscales.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

dragonascent.name: 画龙点睛
dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
dragonascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

mudsport.name: 玩泥巴
mudsport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.
mudsport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

clamp.name: 贝壳夹击
clamp.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
clamp.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

vitalthrow.name: 借力摔
vitalthrow.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.

poweruppunch.name: 增强拳
poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

poisonjab.name: 毒击
poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

aerialace.name: 燕返
aerialace.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

swallow.name: 吞下
swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.shortDesc: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

withdraw.name: 缩入壳中
withdraw.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

scald.name: 热水
scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

hydrocannon.name: 加农水炮
hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

batonpass.name: 接棒
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
batonpass.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

uproar.name: 吵闹
uproar.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends three turns locked into this move. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means; Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
uproar.shortDesc: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

firepledge.name: 火之誓约
firepledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 Base Power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 Base Power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Ability Serene Grace. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
firepledge.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

avalanche.name: 雪崩
avalanche.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
avalanche.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

mefirst.name: 抢先一步
mefirst.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Thief, or Struggle. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
mefirst.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

ragepowder.name: 愤怒粉
ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.
ragepowder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

flowershield.name: 鲜花防守
flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
flowershield.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

circlethrow.name: 巴投
circlethrow.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Ability Suction Cups, or this move hit a substitute.
circlethrow.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

shoreup.name: 集沙
shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shoreup.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

aeroblast.name: 气旋攻击
aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

powersplit.name: 力量平分
powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
powersplit.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

hyperbeam.name: 破坏光线
hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

razorleaf.name: 飞叶快刀
razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

frustration.name: 迁怒
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

absorb.name: 吸取
absorb.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
absorb.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

multiattack.name: 多属性攻击
multiattack.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.
multiattack.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Memory.

sludgewave.name: 污泥波
sludgewave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

weatherball.name: 气象球
weatherball.desc: Power doubles during weather effects and this move's type changes to match; Ice type during Hail, Water type during Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Sunny Day.
weatherball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

waterfall.name: 攀瀑
waterfall.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

eerieimpulse.name: 怪异电波
eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

flamethrower.name: 喷射火焰
flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

stealthrock.name: 隐形岩
stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in. Can be used only once before failing. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

slackoff.name: 偷懒
slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

bulkup.name: 健美
bulkup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bulkup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

guardianofalola.name: 巨人卫士-阿罗拉
guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
guardianofalola.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

poisonfang.name: 剧毒牙
poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

tailglow.name: 萤火
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

stomp.name: 踩踏
stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

sparklingaria.name: 泡影的咏叹
sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

foresight.name: 识破
foresight.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

reflecttype.name: 镜面属性
reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. Fails if the user is an Arceus.
reflecttype.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

rocksmash.name: 碎岩
rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

outrage.name: 逆鳞
outrage.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

bugbite.name: 虫咬
bugbite.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
bugbite.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

cottonguard.name: 棉花防守
cottonguard.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.

acidspray.name: 酸液炸弹

acidspray.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

leechlife.name: 吸血
leechlife.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
leechlife.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

sandstorm.name: 沙暴
sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Abilities Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil. The Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.

meditate.name: 瑜珈姿势
meditate.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

doublehit.name: 二连击
doublehit.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

toxicthread.name: 毒丝
toxicthread.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.
toxicthread.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

disarmingvoice.name: 魅惑之声
disarmingvoice.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

switcheroo.name: 掉包
switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.
switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

rockpolish.name: 岩石打磨
rockpolish.desc: 提升使用者的速度两级。

allyswitch.name: 交换场地
allyswitch.desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side.
allyswitch.shortDesc: The user swaps positions with its ally.

topsyturvy.name: 颠倒
topsyturvy.desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0.

iondeluge.name: 等离子浴
iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
iondeluge.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

reflect.name: 反射壁
reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Brick Break removes the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

snatch.name: 抢夺
snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses one of the following moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move in the same turn, the applicable moves will be stolen in turn order; a move cannot be stolen multiple times. Aqua Ring, Aromatherapy, Autotomize, Belly Drum, Camouflage, Charge, Conversion, Cosmic Power, Cotton Guard, Heal Bell, Healing Wish, Imprison, Ingrain, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Lunar Dance, Magnet Rise, Mist, Power Trick, Quick Guard, Recycle, Reflect, Refresh, Safeguard, Stockpile, Substitute, Swallow, Tailwind, Wide Guard, Wish, and any move that has a primary effect of raising the user's stats or healing the user.
snatch.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

quiverdance.name: 蝶舞
quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quiverdance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

smartstrike.name: 修长之角
smartstrike.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

furyswipes.name: 乱抓
furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

heartstamp.name: 爱心印章
heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

perishsong.name: 灭亡之歌
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

lunardance.name: 新月舞
lunardance.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
lunardance.shortDesc: User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.

quash.name: 延后
quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.

sludgebomb.name: 污泥炸弹
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

acid.name: 溶解液
acid.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
acid.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Def by 1.

crushgrip.name: 捏碎

crushgrip.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

meanlook.name: 黑色目光
meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

steelwing.name: 钢翼
steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

discharge.name: 放电
discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

nightdaze.name: 暗黑爆破
nightdaze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
nightdaze.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

flamewheel.name: 火焰轮
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

firespin.name: 火焰旋涡
firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
firespin.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

smokescreen.name: 烟幕
smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

growl.name: 叫声
growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

feintattack.name: 出奇一击
feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

naturesmadness.name: 自然之怒
naturesmadness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
naturesmadness.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

sweetkiss.name: 天使之吻

magiccoat.name: 魔法反射
magiccoat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. If the user has the Ability Soundproof, this move's effect happens before a sound-based move can be nullified. The Abilities Lightning Rod and Storm Drain redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

forcepalm.name: 发劲
forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

bubble.name: 泡沫
bubble.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

frenzyplant.name: 疯狂植物

judgment.name: 制裁光砾

electroball.name: 电球
electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1.
electroball.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.

voltswitch.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious or protected by the Ability Aroma Veil are immune.

astonish.name: 惊吓

The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

waterpledge.name: 水之誓约

thunderfang.name: 雷电牙

thunderfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.

energyball.name: 能量球
energyball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.

lowkick.name: 踢倒
lowkick.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.
lowkick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

spore.name: 蘑菇孢子
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

electricterrain.name: 电气场地
electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.

leaftornado.name: 青草搅拌器
leaftornado.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
leaftornado.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

inferno.name: 炼狱
inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

mudbomb.name: 泥巴炸弹
mudbomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudbomb.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

hiddenpower.name: 觉醒力量
hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

flatter.name: 吹捧
flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

firefang.name: 火焰牙
firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

photongeyser.name: 光子喷涌
photongeyser.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's higher attacking stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
photongeyser.shortDesc: Uses higher attacking stat in damage calculation.

pluck.name: 啄食
pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

facade.name: 硬撑
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

shadowclaw.name: 阴影爪
shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

painsplit.name: 分担痛楚
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

amnesia.name: 瞬间失忆
amnesia.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
amnesia.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.

block.name: 挡路
block.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

technoblast.name: 高科技光炮
technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
technoblast.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Drive.

round.name: 轮唱
round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
round.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

scaryface.name: 鬼面
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

selfdestruct.name: 自爆
selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.
selfdestruct.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

spitup.name: 喷出
spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.shortDesc: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

powerswap.name: 力量互换
powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
powerswap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

strugglebug.name: 虫之抵抗
strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
strugglebug.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

blizzard.name: 暴风雪
blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy.

echoedvoice.name: 回声
echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

triplekick.name: 三连踢
triplekick.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids any of the hits. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

cottonspore.name: 棉孢子
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

bulldoze.name: 重踏
bulldoze.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower adjacent Pkmn Speed by 1.

eruption.name: 喷火
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

woodhammer.name: 木槌
woodhammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

tickle.name: 挠痒
tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
tickle.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

fling.name: 投掷
fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Ability Harvest. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Ability Klutz.
fling.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

nastyplot.name: 诡计
nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

revelationdance.name: 觉醒之舞
revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type.
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

solarbeam.name: 日光束
solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

bounce.name: 弹跳
bounce.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

softboiled.name: 生蛋
softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

doubleslap.name: 连环巴掌
doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

flail.name: 抓狂
flail.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

moongeistbeam.name: 暗影之光
moongeistbeam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moongeistbeam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

firepunch.name: 火焰拳
firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

iceball.name: 冰球
iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

sunnyday.name: 大晴天
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

diamondstorm.name: 钻石风暴
diamondstorm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.
diamondstorm.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise user's Def by 2 for each hit.

agility.name: 高速移动
agility.desc: 提升使用者的速度两级。

crushclaw.name: 撕裂爪
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

psychic.name: 精神强念
psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

thrash.name: 大闹一番
thrash.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
thrash.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

afteryou.name: 您先请
afteryou.desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn.
afteryou.shortDesc: The target makes its move right after the user.

icepunch.name: 冷冻拳
icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

sacredfire.name: 神圣之火
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

speedswap.name: 速度互换
speedswap.desc: The user swaps its raw Speed stat with the target.

heatcrash.name: 高温重压
heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

brickbreak.name: 劈瓦
brickbreak.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
brickbreak.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

glaciate.name: 冰封世界
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

roost.name: 羽栖
roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

featherdance.name: 羽毛舞
featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

worryseed.name: 烦恼种子
worryseed.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Insomnia, Multitype, Stance Change, or Truant.

grudge.name: 怨念
grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if a foe's attack knocks the user out, that foe loses all remaining PP for that attack.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

spite.name: 怨恨
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

rage.name: 愤怒
rage.desc: Once this move is successfuly used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
rage.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

tearfullook.name: 泪眼汪汪
tearfullook.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
tearfullook.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

seedflare.name: 种子闪光
seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

earthquake.name: 地震
earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dig.

originpulse.name: 根源波动
originpulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

relicsong.name: 古老之歌
relicsong.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Ability Sheer Force. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

soak.name: 浸水
soak.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus.
soak.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Water.

darkpulse.name: 恶之波动
darkpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

dualchop.name: 二连劈
dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

helpinghand.name: 帮助
helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

karatechop.name: 空手劈
karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

thousandarrows.name: 千箭齐发
thousandarrows.desc: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
thousandarrows.shortDesc: Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.

magnetbomb.name: 磁铁炸弹
magnetbomb.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

mudslap.name: 掷泥
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

boltstrike.name: 雷击
boltstrike.desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

superfang.name: 愤怒门牙
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

miracleeye.name: 奇迹之眼
miracleeye.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

smellingsalts.name: 清醒
smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

doublekick.name: 二连踢
doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

rollout.name: 滚动
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

fellstinger.name: 致命针刺
fellstinger.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
fellstinger.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

swift.name: 高速星星
swift.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

submission.name: 地狱翻滚
submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

boneclub.name: 骨棒
boneclub.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

wildcharge.name: 疯狂伏特
wildcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

assurance.name: 恶意追击
assurance.desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.
assurance.shortDesc: Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.

beakblast.name: 鸟嘴加农炮
beakblast.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.
beakblast.shortDesc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

muddywater.name: 浊流
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

stokedsparksurfer.name: 驾雷驭电戏冲浪
stokedsparksurfer.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

airslash.name: 空气斩
airslash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

imprison.name: 封印
imprison.desc: The user prevents all of its foes from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

armthrust.name: 猛推
armthrust.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

tailwhip.name: 摇尾巴
tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

fusionbolt.name: 交错闪电
fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare.

spikyshield.name: 尖刺防守
spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
spikyshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

magnetrise.name: 电磁漂浮
magnetrise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground moves.

closecombat.name: 近身战
closecombat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
closecombat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

screech.name: 刺耳声
screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

skyattack.name: 神鸟猛击
skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

electrify.name: 输电
electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

mirrorshot.name: 镜光射击
mirrorshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mirrorshot.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

aurasphere.name: 波导弹
aurasphere.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

skillswap.name: 特性互换
skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Illusion, Multitype, Stance Change, or Wonder Guard, but does not fail if both have the same Ability.
skillswap.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

stickyweb.name: 黏黏网
stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used only once before failing. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

acrobatics.name: 杂技
acrobatics.desc: 在使用者不持有道具的时候给予双倍伤害。
acrobatics.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

trickortreat.name: 万圣夜
trickortreat.desc: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
trickortreat.shortDesc: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).

anchorshot.name: 掷锚
anchorshot.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
anchorshot.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

sleeptalk.name: 梦话
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Belch, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

dragonbreath.name: 龙息
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

psychoboost.name: 精神增压
psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

10000000voltthunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
10000000voltthunderbolt.desc: Has a very high chance for a critical hit.

workup.name: 自我激励
workup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
workup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

extremeevoboost.name: 九彩升华齐聚顶
extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
extremeevoboost.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

naturalgift.name: 自然之恩
naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Ability Klutz, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

recover.name: 自我再生
recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

shadowforce.name: 暗影潜袭
shadowforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shadowforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

venomdrench.name: 毒液陷阱
venomdrench.desc: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned.
venomdrench.shortDesc: Lowers Atk, Sp. Atk, Speed of poisoned foes by 1.

reversal.name: 起死回生
reversal.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

payback.name: 以牙还牙
payback.desc: Power doubles if the target moves before the user; power is not doubled if the target switches out.
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

lavaplume.name: 喷烟
lavaplume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

watershuriken.name: 飞水手里剑
watershuriken.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times. Base power is 20 if the user is Ash-Greninja.

whirlwind.name: 吹飞
whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Ability Suction Cups.
whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

ancientpower.name: 原始力量
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ancientpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

explosion.name: 大爆炸
explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

doubleedge.name: 舍身冲撞
doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

lastresort.name: 珍藏
lastresort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
lastresort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

zenheadbutt.name: 意念头锤
zenheadbutt.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

paleowave.name: Paleo Wave
paleowave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
paleowave.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

wonderroom.name: 奇妙空间
wonderroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon have their Defense and Special Defense stats swapped. Stat stage changes are unaffected. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
wonderroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all Defense and Sp. Def stats switch.

celebrate.name: 庆祝
celebrate.shortDesc: No competitive use. Or any use.

flamecharge.name: 蓄能焰袭
flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

flash.name: 闪光
flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

lightofruin.name: 破灭之光
lightofruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

sonicboom.name: 音爆
sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

dreameater.name: 食梦
dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

fakeout.name: 击掌奇袭
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

minimize.name: 变小
minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

copycat.name: 仿效
copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Belch, Bestow, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.
copycat.shortDesc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

shiftgear.name: 换挡
shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shiftgear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

harden.name: 变硬
harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.name: 月华飞溅落灵霄
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

toxic.name: 剧毒
toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.

petaldance.name: 花瓣舞
petaldance.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

gigaimpact.name: 终极冲击
gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

searingshot.name: 火焰弹
searingshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

furyattack.name: 乱击
furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

thunderbolt.name: 十万伏特
thunderbolt.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

spotlight.name: 聚光灯
spotlight.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from other Pokemon are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royale.
spotlight.shortDesc: Moves redirect to the target on the turn used.

healblock.name: 回复封锁
healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Ability Regenerator are unaffected.
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

heatwave.name: 热风
heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

headsmash.name: 双刃头锤
headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

quickguard.name: 快速防守
quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

faketears.name: 假哭
faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

cosmicpower.name: 宇宙力量
cosmicpower.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cosmicpower.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

rockwrecker.name: 岩石炮
rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

acupressure.name: 点穴
acupressure.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
acupressure.shortDesc: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

magikarpsrevenge.name: Magikarp's Revenge
magikarpsrevenge.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target and lower its Defense and Special Attack by 1 stage. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If this move is successful, the weather changes to rain unless it is already in effect, and the user gains the effects of Aqua Ring and Magic Coat.
magikarpsrevenge.shortDesc: Does many things turn 1. Can't move turn 2.

aurorabeam.name: 极光束
aurorabeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
aurorabeam.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the foe's Attack by 1.

hyperspacefury.name: 异次元猛攻
hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protection.

icefang.name: 冰冻牙
icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

disable.name: 定身法
disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move.
disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

wrap.name: 紧束
wrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
wrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

infestation.name: 死缠烂打
infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
infestation.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

gearup.name: 辅助齿轮
gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.
gearup.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

conversion2.name: 纹理２
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion2.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

nightslash.name: 暗袭要害
nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

clearsmog.name: 清除之烟
clearsmog.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

bonemerang.name: 骨头回力镖
bonemerang.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

incinerate.name: 烧尽
incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

geomancy.name: 大地掌控
geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

sandattack.name: 泼沙
sandattack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

growth.name: 生长
growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day, raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

gigadrain.name: 终极吸取
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

return.name: 报恩
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

sacredsword.name: 圣剑
sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
sacredsword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

vcreate.name: V热焰
vcreate.desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage.
vcreate.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

roleplay.name: 扮演
roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Multitype, Stance Change, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

plasmafists.name: 等离子闪电拳
plasmafists.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

grassyterrain.name: 青草场地
grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.

bellydrum.name: 腹鼓
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
bellydrum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

crosspoison.name: 十字毒刃
crosspoison.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
crosspoison.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

crabhammer.name: 蟹钳锤
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

overheat.name: 过热
overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

thunder.name: 打雷
thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.
thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze target. Can't miss in rain.

chipaway.name: 逐步击破
chipaway.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
chipaway.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

mysticalfire.name: 魔法火焰
mysticalfire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalfire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

dragondance.name: 龙之舞
dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

nightmare.name: 恶梦
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

holdhands.name: 牵手
holdhands.desc: Nothing happens... Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
holdhands.shortDesc: No competitive use. Or any use.

irontail.name: 铁尾
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

kingsshield.name: 王者盾牌
kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from attacks. Contact try: lowers Atk by 2.

bite.name: 咬住
bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

counter.name: 双倍奉还
counter.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's physical attack this turn.
counter.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

attackorder.name: 攻击指令
attackorder.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

crosschop.name: 十字劈
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

rapidspin.name: 高速旋转
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and partial-trapping moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Frees user from hazards/partial trap/Leech Seed.

wish.name: 祈愿
wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded half up. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

luckychant.name: 幸运咒语
luckychant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
luckychant.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

holdback.name: 手下留情
holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

taunt.name: 挑衅
taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious or protected by the Ability Aroma Veil are immune.
taunt.shortDesc: For 3 turns, the target can't use status moves.

forestscurse.name: 森林诅咒
forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

boomburst.name: 爆音波
boomburst.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

roaroftime.name: 时光咆哮
roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

furycutter.name: 连斩
furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power; power is reset if the move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

belch.name: 打嗝
belch.desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.
belch.shortDesc: Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.

curse.name: 诅咒
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else +1 Atk, +1 Def, -1 Spe.

sing.name: 唱歌
sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

assist.name: 借助
assist.desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Belch, Bestow, Bounce, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.
assist.shortDesc: Uses a random move known by a team member.

megadrain.name: 超级吸取
megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
megadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

lusterpurge.name: 洁净光芒
lusterpurge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

flyingpress.name: 飞身重压
flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

burnup.name: 燃尽
burnup.desc: Until the user is no longer active, Fire-type users lose their Fire type and pure Fire-type users become Normal type.
burnup.shortDesc: User's Fire-type is removed until it switches out.

blueflare.name: 青焰
blueflare.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

shadowstrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowstrike.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowstrike.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

revenge.name: 报复
revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

ominouswind.name: 奇异之风
ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

instruct.name: 号令
instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the move is...
instruct.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

dizzypunch.name: 迷昏拳
dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

playrough.name: 嬉闹
playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

prismaticlaser.name: 棱镜镭射
prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

wringout.name: 绞紧
wringout.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
wringout.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

pollenpuff.name: 花粉团
pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
pollenpuff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

healbell.name: 治愈铃声
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Ability Soundproof are not cured.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

signalbeam.name: 信号光束
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

frostbreath.name: 冰息
frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.
frostbreath.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

mistyterrain.name: 薄雾场地
mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a major status condition nor confusion. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
mistyterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

struggle.name: 挣扎
struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to one adjacent foe at random. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up; the Ability Rock Head does not prevent this. This move can only be used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 25% of its max HP as recoil.

captivate.name: 诱惑
captivate.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious are immune.
captivate.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 2 if opposite gender.

magnitude.name: 震级
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

tailslap.name: 扫尾拍打
tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

splash.name: 跃起
splash.shortDesc: Does nothing (but we still love it).

iciclespear.name: 冰锥
iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

transform.name: 变身
transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if the target has a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
transform.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

milkdrink.name: 喝牛奶
