milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

guillotine.name: 断头钳
guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

hyperspacehole.name: 异次元洞
hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

slash.name: 劈开
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

hornleech.name: 木角
hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

ingrain.name: 扎根
ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Ability Levitate.
ingrain.shortDesc: User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn. Traps user.

metronome.name: 节拍器
metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Assist, Belch, Bestow, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Happy Hour, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, King's Shield, Light of Ruin, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Relic Song, Secret Sword, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Spiky Shield, Steam Eruption, Struggle, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Transform, Trick, V-create, or Wide Guard.

blazekick.name: 火焰踢
blazekick.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
blazekick.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

grassknot.name: 打草结
grassknot.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

endeavor.name: 蛮干
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

bubblebeam.name: 泡沫光线
bubblebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubblebeam.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

gust.name: 起风
gust.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop.

lockon.name: 锁定
lockon.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.
lockon.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

strengthsap.name: 吸取力量
strengthsap.desc: The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat, calculated with its stat stage, then lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
strengthsap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

icebeam.name: 冰冻光束
icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

gyroball.name: 陀螺球
gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed), rounded down, + 1, but not more than 150.
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.

rockslide.name: 岩崩
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

firelash.name: 火焰鞭
firelash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
firelash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

laserfocus.name: 磨砺
laserfocus.desc: On the next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit. Fails if the user already has the effect.
laserfocus.shortDesc: Next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit.

gastroacid.name: 胃液
gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change.

headcharge.name: 爆炸头撞击
headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

stoneedge.name: 尖石攻击
stoneedge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

toxicspikes.name: 毒菱
toxicspikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, poisoning each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to two times before failing. Foes become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the foe's party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
toxicspikes.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

defensecurl.name: 变圆
defensecurl.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

secretsword.name: 神秘之剑
secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
secretsword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

haze.name: 黑雾
haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

lightscreen.name: 光墙
lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.
lightscreen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

iceburn.name: 极寒冷焰
iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

confusion.name: 念力
confusion.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

beatup.name: 围攻
beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

focusblast.name: 真气弹
focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

psychup.name: 自我暗示
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

surf.name: 冲浪
surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dive.

hypnosis.name: 催眠术
hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

finalgambit.name: 搏命
finalgambit.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
finalgambit.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

skydrop.name: 自由落体
skydrop.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally or if the target has a substitute.
skydrop.shortDesc: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

leafstorm.name: 飞叶风暴
leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

chargebeam.name: 充电光束
chargebeam.desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
chargebeam.shortDesc: 70% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

dig.name: 挖洞
dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

fusionflare.name: 交错火焰
fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt.

searingsunrazesmash.name: 日光回旋下苍穹
searingsunrazesmash.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
searingsunrazesmash.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

synthesis.name: 光合作用
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

partingshot.name: 抛下狠话
partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

dracometeor.name: 流星群
dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

meteormash.name: 彗星拳
meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

powdersnow.name: 细雪
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

detect.name: 看穿
detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
detect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

mirrorcoat.name: 镜面反射
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

mindreader.name: 心之眼
mindreader.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.
mindreader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

thundershock.name: 电击
thundershock.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

spark.name: 电光
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

freezedry.name: 冷冻干燥
freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

spiderweb.name: 蛛网
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

knockoff.name: 拍落
knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Ability Sticky Hold, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item, cause Pokemon that can Mega Evolve to lose the Mega Stone for their species, or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, or Drive, respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

throatchop.name: 地狱突刺
throatchop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
throatchop.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

powertrip.name: 嚣张
powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
powertrip.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

swagger.name: 虚张声势
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

hurricane.name: 暴风
hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

camouflage.name: 保护色
camouflage.desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.
camouflage.shortDesc: Changes user's type by terrain (default Normal).

triattack.name: 三冲攻击
triattack.desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
triattack.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

pursuit.name: 追打
pursuit.desc: If an adjacent foe switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after a foe using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that foe before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits a foe switching out, and the user's turn is over; if a foe faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: Power doubles if a foe is switching out.

acidarmor.name: 溶化
acidarmor.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

superpower.name: 蛮力
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

trumpcard.name: 王牌
trumpcard.desc: This move does not check accuracy. The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Ability Pressure resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.
trumpcard.shortDesc: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

icehammer.name: 冰锤
icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

bestow.name: 传递礼物
bestow.desc: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item.
bestow.shortDesc: User passes its held item to the target.

irondefense.name: 铁壁
irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

stormthrow.name: 山岚摔
stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.
stormthrow.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

present.name: 礼物
present.desc: Deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. This move must hit to be effective.
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target by 1/4 max HP.

spiritshackle.name: 缝影
spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiritshackle.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

telekinesis.name: 意念移物
telekinesis.desc: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
telekinesis.shortDesc: For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.

babydolleyes.name: 圆瞳
babydolleyes.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

safeguard.name: 神秘守护
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog.
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

spikes.name: 撒菱
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to three times before failing. Foes lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

bodyslam.name: 泰山压顶
bodyslam.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

bravebird.name: 勇鸟猛攻
bravebird.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

rocktomb.name: 岩石封锁
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

drillrun.name: 直冲钻
drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

raindance.name: 求雨
raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

watersport.name: 玩水
watersport.desc: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.
watersport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

thousandwaves.name: 千波激荡
thousandwaves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
thousandwaves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.

snore.name: 鼾声
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

twineedle.name: 双针
twineedle.desc: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
twineedle.shortDesc: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.

liquidation.name: 水流裂破
liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
liquidation.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

healpulse.name: 治愈波动
healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Ability Mega Launcher, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

stockpile.name: 蓄力
stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3.
stockpile.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

flashcannon.name: 加农光炮
flashcannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
flashcannon.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

healingwish.name: 治愈之愿
healingwish.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Replacement is fully healed.

aromaticmist.name: 芳香薄雾
aromaticmist.desc: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
aromaticmist.shortDesc: Raises an ally's Sp. Def by 1.

takedown.name: 猛撞
takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

shadowbone.name: 暗影之骨
shadowbone.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowbone.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

coreenforcer.name: 核心惩罚者
coreenforcer.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change, this effect does not happen.
coreenforcer.shortDesc: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the target moves first.

thief.name: 小偷
thief.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
thief.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

bide.name: 忍耐
bide.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer on the field, the user attacks a random foe instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy.
bide.shortDesc: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.

drainpunch.name: 吸取拳
drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

psybeam.name: 精神光线
psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

flareblitz.name: 闪焰冲锋
flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

guardswap.name: 防御互换
guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

mirrormove.name: 鹦鹉学舌
mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or the last move used was Acupressure, After You, Aromatherapy, Aromatic Mist, Belch, Conversion 2, Counter, Crafty Shield, Curse, Doom Desire, Electric Terrain, Final Gambit, Flower Shield, Focus Punch, Future Sight, Grassy Terrain, Gravity, Guard Split, Hail, Happy Hour, Haze, Heal Bell, Heal Pulse, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Ion Deluge, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Magnetic Flux, Mat Block, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Mist, Misty Terrain, Mud Sport, Nature Power, Perish Song, Power Split, Psych Up, Quick Guard, Rain Dance, Reflect, Reflect Type, Role Play, Rototiller, Safeguard, Sandstorm, Sketch, Spikes, Spit Up, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Struggle, Sunny Day, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Transform, Water Sport, Wide Guard, or any move that is self-targeting.
mirrormove.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

shadowball.name: 暗影球
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

silverwind.name: 银色旋风

floralhealing.name: 花疗
floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
floralhealing.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

wakeupslap.name: 唤醒巴掌
wakeupslap.desc: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.

focusenergy.name: 聚气

focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

psywave.name: 精神波
psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X+50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

nightshade.name: 黑夜魔影

simplebeam.name: 单纯光束
simplebeam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype, Simple, Stance Change, or Truant.

needlearm.name: 尖刺臂

recycle.name: 回收利用

Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

constrict.name: 缠绕

twister.name: 龙卷风

fly.name: 飞翔

fly.shortDesc: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

blastburn.name: 爆裂烈焰
blastburn.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

destinybond.name: 同命

destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

icywind.name: 冰冻之风
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

sunsteelstrike.name: 流星闪冲
sunsteelstrike.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

electroweb.name: 电网

If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

protect.name: 守住
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

skullbash.name: 火箭头锤

bugbuzz.name: 虫鸣

matblock.name: 掀榻榻米

trick.name: 戏法

Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.

teeterdance.name: 摇晃舞

storedpower.name: 辅助力量
storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

followme.name: 看我嘛
followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.

lovelykiss.name: 恶魔之吻
lovelykiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

roar.name: 吼叫

memento.name: 临别礼物

venoshock.name: 毒液冲击

fleurcannon.name: 花朵加农炮

bonerush.name: 骨棒乱打

If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

mistball.name: 薄雾球

If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's attack this turn.
metalburst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

synchronoise.name: 同步干扰
synchronoise.desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
synchronoise.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

coil.name: 盘蜷
coil.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
coil.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1.

substitute.name: 替身

The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Ability Infiltrator ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is partially trapped, the partial-trapping effect ends immediately. This move fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a Substitute.

embargo.name: 查封

If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.

oblivionwing.name: 死亡之翼

jumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

clangoroussoulblaze.name: 炽魂热舞烈音爆

clangoroussoulblaze.shortDesc: Boosts all stats 1 stage. Hits adjacent foes.

solarblade.name: 日光刃
solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.

Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.

drainingkiss.name: 吸收之吻

drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

yawn.name: 哈欠

If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.

stringshot.name: 吐丝

precipiceblades.name: 断崖之剑
precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

volttackle.name: 伏特攻击

gunkshot.name: 垃圾射击

fairylock.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

conversion.name: 纹理
conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match its first move.

magneticflux.name: 磁场操控
magneticflux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.
magneticflux.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

extrasensory.name: 神通力
extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
